text: Yabona xa u’Isâ, unyana ka Maryam, wathi: “Hini na Bantwana bakwaSirayeli, inene mna ndinguMthunywa ka- Allâh kuni, ndingqina oko kwafika ngaphambili kunam kukwiTorah, ndiniphathele iindaba ezivuyisayo zoMthunywa oza kufika emveni kwam, ogama lakhe linguAhmad.” Kodwa wathi esakufika kubo, bathi bona: “Lo ngumlingo ocacileyo.”
